about.title: About
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.paragraph1: Hi there! I'm Seba Gedeon, a passionate software engineer specializing in full-stack application development. My expertise spans mobile, web, backend, desktop development, data integration, and DevOps. I'm dedicated to creating robust and secure solutions that meet the complex needs of modern businesses.
about.paragraph2: I bring deep technical expertise in application security, permission systems, and authentication. Whether it's developing high-performance mobile apps, scalable backends, or implementing secure DevOps infrastructures, I master the entire software development chain.
about.paragraph3: Let's work together to bring your technological projects to life with custom, secure, and high-performance solutions. Contact me to discuss your next technical challenge!

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: What I can do for you

items.title: Mobile & Web Development
items.description: Creating native and cross-platform mobile applications, as well as modern and responsive web applications. Expertise in React Native, Flutter, React, Vue.js and advanced web technologies.

items.title: Backend Development & APIs
items.description: Design and development of robust backends, RESTful and GraphQL APIs, microservices and distributed architectures. Mastery of Node.js, Python, Java, and relational/NoSQL databases.

items.title: Desktop Apps & Integration
items.description: Development of cross-platform desktop applications and data integration solutions. Expertise in Electron, .NET, third-party API integration and data synchronization.

items.title: Security & Authentication
items.description: Implementation of secure authentication systems, permission management, OAuth, JWT, encryption and application security best practices to protect your sensitive data.

items.title: DevOps & Infrastructure
items.description: Setting up CI/CD pipelines, Docker containerization, Kubernetes orchestration, monitoring, and automated cloud deployment (AWS, Azure, GCP) for scalable applications.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.description: Have a software development project in mind? I'd love to discuss how we can collaborate to create innovative and secure technical solutions. Feel free to reach out and explore the possibilities.

hero.name: I'm Seba Gedeon
hero.description: A Software Engineer who builds robust, scalable applications across the full technology stack. I specialize in mobile, web, and backend development, with expertise in modern frameworks, cloud deployment, and creating secure, high-performance solutions.
